field.name: get-cereal-price
field.prompt: Please select the cereal type you are interested in by pressing the corresponding number. If you want to know the price of rice, press one. If you want to know the price of cotton, press two. If you want to know the price of sorghum, press three.

if.prompt: The current price of rice is 5 Euro per kilogram.
The current price of cotton is 7 Euro per kilogram.
The current price of sorghum is 9 Euro per kilogram.
